ANU.name: Julia Jasonsmith
expertise: Soil Chemistry Excl. Carbon Sequestration Science
interest: Julia  is an environmental chemist with a PhD in Earth Sciences. Julia's main  interests centre on how chemicals move through ecosystems and their  influence on the environment. The main media on which she focuses are soil, water, and groundwater.
ANU.biography: Julia has worked on applied environmental projects in numerous countries, accumulating knowledge and experience that encompasses  environmental chemistry,  ecotoxicology, and catchment management. She  has applied these core  expertise in a broad range of fields including  agriculture, ecology,  and contaminated lands. She has more than a  decade's experience in  consulting, research, and project management. She has been Director of Murrang Earth Sciences, a company that works on different aspects of pollution, since 2013.
project: *Persistent organic pollutants in Austalian dust samples
